name.japanese: ガレーラカンパニー本社

description: The main headquarters building of the Galley-La Company, Water 7's premier shipbuilding company. It serves as both the office of Iceburg, the mayor of Water 7 and company president, and the central hub for the company's operations. The building is a large, multi-story structure located in the heart of Water 7.

keyEvents.title: Rob Lucci's Leopard Transformation
keyEvents.description: Rob Lucci reveals his Devil Fruit power and transforms into a leopard at the Galley-La headquarters.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Lucci's true power is revealed.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Defeated
keyEvents.description: Lucci defeats Luffy, Zoro, and Nami at the Galley-La headquarters, sending them into the sea.
keyEvents.significance: Site of the Straw Hats' devastating defeat by CP9.

keyEvents.title: Building Bisected by Rankyaku
keyEvents.description: Rob Lucci uses Rankyaku with such power that it cuts the entire building in half.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the destructive power of Rokushiki techniques.

keyEvents.title: Building Set on Fire
keyEvents.description: CP9 sets the first floor of the Galley-La headquarters on fire using a firebomb, leaving Paulie and Iceburg tied up inside to die.
keyEvents.significance: The headquarters becomes a death trap for those trapped inside.

statusHistory.reason: Functioning normally as Galley-La Company headquarters
Building cut in half by Lucci's Rankyaku and set on fire by CP9

description: Franky's underground hideout and base of operations. It serves as the headquarters for the Franky Family and includes an underground warehouse where Franky works on ship dismantling and construction. The hideout has secret passages and storage areas.

keyEvents.title: Usopp and Franky's Heart-to-Heart
keyEvents.description: Usopp shares his painful story with Franky about leaving the Straw Hat crew, and Franky is moved to tears.
keyEvents.significance: The beginning of Usopp and Franky's friendship and mutual understanding.

keyEvents.title: Franky Shares Tom's Legacy
keyEvents.description: Franky tells Usopp about Tom's contributions to Water 7 and his significance.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up important backstory that will be explored in detail later.

keyEvents.title: Klabautermann Explained
keyEvents.description: Franky begins to explain the concept of the Klabautermann to Usopp.
keyEvents.significance: Validates Usopp's Skypiea experience and adds spiritual depth to the Going Merry storyline.

statusHistory.reason: Functioning as Franky's hideout and base
